title: Resolve an IT Helpdesk Ticket
description: A user reports they cannot log in to the TOS. A helpdesk agent must resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Receive the helpdesk ticket from the user.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent gets a ticket stating 'Cannot log in to TOS'.

tasks.description: Check the user's account status in the user management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the user's password has expired.

tasks.description: Reset the user's password and provide them with a temporary one, instructing them to change it upon first login.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent resets the password and communicates the solution to the user, then closes the ticket.
